attributes.action: Allow HGV Vehicles to park at business premises on a red route when delivering and avoid Parking Tickets!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I work in the Haulage Industry (South Wales) and I am fed up whenever one of our HGV Vehicles drives into London and has no choice than to park outside a customers premises to deliver goods which they have PAID for that happens to be on a RED ROUTE, that we pick up Parking Tickets.  How does the Government propose we get around this issue and stop hitting the Transport Industry constantly, Park on a erd route in a HGV Vehicle and a parking ticket will cost you £100.  Scandalous
